title: Person Of Interest - Pilot - The Beginning Part 2
author: Morgs K
comment: Jim caviezel is just the perfect batman.
0:35 never though i'd see anybody taller than reese.
Harold Finch is my favourite character, his composure, moral compass and authenticity are out of this world . Only if rich people were this altruistic, the world would definitely be a better place
This was such a great show.  Nothing on the air today comes close
This show didn't run nearly long enough. It should have gone 10 seasons.
description: We meet Finch - Reese doesn't want a bar of him - So he smacks Finch's bodyguard ... but
